manzils.text: 37|1|Sapata saraibad'dha phiraistasakalara
37|2|tara pichata kathora paraicalakasakalara
37|3|arau upadesa grantha tilaratakaraisakalara
37|4|niscaya tomalokara ilaha ejana
37|5|yijana akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastura raba arau udayasthala samuharao raba.
37|6|Niscaya ami nikatararti akasakhanaka naksatraraajira saundaryarae susobhita karaicho
37|7|arau raksa karaicho pratyeka bidraohi cayatanara paraa.
37|8|Phalata sihamte urd'dhajagatara ekorae suniba noraarae, karana ke'uphalara paraa sihamtara prati niksepa karaa haya (ulkapinda)
37|9|sihamtaka khedi pathi'oraara babe, arau sihamtara babe ache abiraama sasti.
37|10|Kintu hathat konoba'i kiba sunile jbalanta ulkapinda'i tara piche piche khedi yaya.
37|11|Eteke sihamtaka sudhi coraacona, srstira ksetrata sihamte bechi jatila ne ami ana yibora srsti karaicho se'ibora? Ami sihamtaka dekhuna alatiya matira paraa srsti karaicho.
37|12|Baram tumi bismaya bodha karaicha, arau sihamte bidraupa karai ache.
37|13|Arau yetiya sihamtaka upadesa diya haya, tetiya sihamte seya grahana nakarae.
37|14|Arau yetiya sihamte kono nidarsana dekhe, tetiya sihamte upahasa karae.
37|15|Arau kaya, ‘e'ito dekhuna suspasta yadura bahirae ana eko nahaya.
37|16|‘Ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima lagate mati arau asthita parainata hama, tathapi'o amaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’bane
37|17|‘arau amara pitr-purausa sakaloko’
37|18|koraa, ‘haya, arau tomaloka ha’ba lanchita’.
37|19|Eteke seya kerala eta matra pracanda dhamaka, tatksanat sihamte thara lagi ca'i thakiba.
37|20|Arau sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! E'ito dekhuna pratidana dirasa’.
37|21|E'itorae'i phayacalara dina, yi bisaye tomaloke abisbasa karaichila.
37|22|(Phiraistasakalaka koraa ha’ba) ‘ekatraita karaa yalimasakalaka arau sihamtara sangi-sarathisakalaka arau se'iborako yiborara sihamte ibadata karaichila
37|23|allahara bahirae, arau sihamtaka jahannamara patha dekhuraa'i diya
37|24|‘arau sihamtaka rakhoraacona, niscaya sihamtaka prasna karaa ha’ba.
37|25|‘Ki ha’la tomalokara, tomaloke kiya ijane sijanara sahaya karaa na'i etiya’
37|26|prakrtate sihamta ha’ba aji atmasamarpanakarai.
37|27|Arau sihamte ijane sijanara mukha-makhi hai sodha-pocha karaiba
37|28|sihamte ka’ba, ‘niscaya tomaloke'i amara ocaralai sapata lai ahichila’.
37|29|Sihamte (netrsthaniya kaphirabilake) ka’ba, ‘baram tomaloke'i mumina nachila
37|30|‘arau tomalokara oparata amara kono kartrtba nachila; daraacalate tomaloke'i achila simalanghanakarai sampradaya.
37|31|‘Seye amara biraud'dhe amara pratipalakara katha satya hicape sabyasta haiche, niscaya ami sasti asbadana karaima.
37|32|‘Eteke amiye'i tomalokaka bibhraanta karaichilo, karana ami nije'o achilo bibhraanta’.
37|33|Tara pichata niscaya sihamta ataye se'idina sastita ansidara ha’ba.
37|34|Niscaya ami aparaadhibilakara lagata enekuraa acarane'i karao.
37|35|Sihamtaka yetiya koraa haichila, ‘allahara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i’, tetiya sihamte ahankara karaichila.
37|36|Arau kaichila, ‘ami ejana unmada kabira kathata amara ilahasamuhaka barjana karaima neki’
37|37|baram te'om satya lai ahiche arau (bigata) raachulasakalako satya buli sbikara karaiche.
37|38|Niscaya tomaloke yantranadayaka sastira asbadanakarai haba
37|39|arau tomaloke yi karaichila kerala tarae'i pratiphala paba
37|40|kintu te'omloka nahaya, yisakala allahara ekanistha banda.
37|41|Te'omlokara babe ache nirdharaita raijikba (jiraika)
37|42|Phalamula; arau te'omloka ha’ba sanmanita
37|43|niyamaterae bharaa jannatata
37|44|mukha-mukhi hai asanata bahiba.
37|45|Te'omlokara carai'ophale ghurai ghurai paraibesana karaa ha’ba bisud'dha suraapurna patra
37|46|subhra ujjbala, yibora ha’ba panakarai sakalara babe susbadu.
37|47|Tata ksatikara eko nathakiba arau te'omloka e'iborara dbaraa matoraalo naha’ba.
37|48|Te'omlokara ocarata thakiba anata nayana, danara caku bisista (hurasakala).
37|49|Te'omloka yeniba acchadita kani.
37|50|Tara pichata te'omloke parasparae mukha-mukhi hai sodha-pocha karaiba.
37|51|Te'omlokara konoba'i ka’ba, ‘(prthiraita) mora ejana sangi achila
37|52|si kaichila, tumi'o sihamtara antarbhukta neki, yisakale bisbasa karae ye
37|53|‘ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima arau ami mati o asthita parainata hama tetiya'o amaka pratiphala diya ha’bane’
37|54|allahe ka’ba, ‘tomaloke taka dekhiba bicaraa neki’
37|55|tara pichata te'om jumi caba arau taka dekha paba jahannamara madhyasthalata
37|56|te'om ka’ba, ‘allahara sapata! Tumito moka praaya dhbansahe karaichila
37|57|‘mora pratipalakara anugraha naha’le dekhuna mayo (jahannamata) upasthitakrta byaktisakalara antarbhukta ha’lohemtena.
37|58|(Yike naha'omka etiya) amara arau duna'i mrtyu nahaya
37|59|‘amara prathama mrtyura pichata arau amaka sasti'o diya nahaba!’
37|60|Niscaya e'itorae'i se'i mahasaphalata.
37|61|Enekuraa saphalatara babe'i amalakarai sakale amala karaa ucita
37|62|(koraacona) apyayanara babe e'iborae'i uttama ne yakkuma gacha uttama
37|63|niscaya ami yalimasakalara babe iyaka paraiksasbaraupa srsti karaicho
37|64|e'i gacha utpanna haya jahannamara talara paraa
37|65|iyara thopa haiche yeniba cayatanara mura
37|66|niscaya sihamte e'ito bhaksana karaiba arau se'itora dbaraa'i peta bharaaba.
37|67|Iyara pichato sihamtara babe thakiba utala panira misrana.
37|68|Tara pichata sihamtara pratyarartana ha’ba jahannamara ju'ira phale.
37|69|Niscaya sihamte sihamtara pitr-purausasakalaka pa'ichila pathabhrasta
37|70|tathapi'o sihamte sihamtara anusaranata drauta gati karaichila.
37|71|Arasye sihamtara purbe'o purbarartisakalara sarahabhaga manuhe'i bipathagami haichila
37|72|arasye ami sihamtara majato satarkakarai praerana karaichilo.
37|73|Eteke coraa, yisakalaka satarka karaa haichila, sihamtara parainama ki haichila
37|74|kintu allahara ekanistha bandasakalara katha sbatantra.
37|75|Arau arasye nuhe amaka ahbana karaichila, eteke (coraa) ami kimana uttamabharae samharai jana'ichilo
37|76|te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargaka ami mahasankatara paraa ud'dhara karaichilo.
37|77|Arau te'omra bansadhara sakalake'i ami arasista raakhichilo
37|78|arau ami parabartisakalara majata te'omra sukhyati raakhi dicho.
37|79|Samagra srstira majata nuhara prati santi barsita ha'omka.
37|80|Niscaya ami e'idarae'i satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao.
37|81|Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama.
37|82|Tara pichata ami anabilakaka duba'i maraichilo.
37|83|Arau niscaya ibraahima te'omra anusarai sakalarae'i antarbhukta.
37|84|Smarana karaa, yetiya te'om nija pratipalakara ocarata bisud'dhacitte upasthita haichila
37|85|yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau te'omra sampradayaka sudhichila, ‘tomaloke kihara ibadata karaicha
37|86|‘tomaloke allahara paraibarte alika upasyaborake bicaraa neki
37|87|‘tente bisbajagatara pratipalaka samparke tomalokara dharana ki’
37|88|tara pichata te'om taraasamuhara pine drstipata karaile.
37|89|Arau ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i asustha’.
37|90|Tara pichata sihamte prsthapradarsana karai te'omra paraa amtarai ga’la.
37|91|Tara pichata te'om ca'iciti sihamtara upasyaborara ocarata ga’la, arau ka’le, ‘tomaloke nokhoraa kiya’
37|92|‘ki ha’la tomalokara, katha nokoraa kiya’
37|93|tara pichata te'om sihamtara oparata sajorae aghata karaile.
37|94|Tetiya (ghurai ahi) manuhe te'omra phale dhapali melile.
37|95|Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke se'iborara upasana karaa neki, yiboraka tomaloke nije'i nirmana karaa’
37|96|‘athaca allahe'i srsti karaiche tomalokaka arau tomaloke yi taiyara karaa se'itorao teraemi srsti karaiche’.
37|97|Sihamte ka’le, ‘iyara babe eta sthapana taiyara karaa, tara pichata iyaka jbalanta ju'ita niksepa karaa’.
37|98|E'idarae'i sihamte te'omra biraud'dhe cakraantara sankalpa karaichila; kintu ami sihamtaka sampurnaraupe paraabhuta karai dilo.
37|99|Te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i mora pratipalakara ocaralai gai acho, niscaya teraemi moka hidayata karaiba
37|100|‘he mora raba! Moka ejana satkarmaparaayana santana dana karaa’.
37|101|Tara pichata ami te'omka ejana sahisnu putrara susambada dilo.

37|102|Eteke yetiya sisuto te'omra pitrra saite calaphuraa karaa arasthata upanita ha’la, tetiya ibraahime ka’le, ‘he mora cenehara putra! Ma'i saponata dekhilo ye, ma'i tomaka yabeha karai acho, etiya koraacona tomara abhimata ki’? Putra'i ka’le, ‘he mora pitr! Apuni yi adesapraapta haiche se'itorae'i karaka. Allahara icchata apuni moka dhairyasila sakalara antarbhukta paba’.
37|103|Eteke te'omloka ubhaye yetiya anugatya prakasa karaile arau ibraahime te'omra putraka talamura karai suraa'i la’le
37|104|tetiya ami te'omka mati ka’lo, ‘he ibraahima
37|105|‘tumi dekhuna saponara adesa samca'i palana karaila! Niscaya e'idarae'i ami satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao’.
37|106|Niscaya e'ito achila eta suspasta paraiksa.
37|107|Arau ami te'omka mukta karailo eta maha kurabanira binimayata.
37|108|Arau ami te'omra babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho.
37|109|Santi barsita ha'omka ibraahimara oparata.
37|110|E'idarae'i ami satkarmasilasakalaka puraskrta karao.
37|111|Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama
37|112|arau ami te'omka ichahakbara susambada dichilo, te'om achila ejana nabi, satkarmasilasakalara an'yatama.

37|113|Arau ami ibraahimara oparata barakata dana karaichilo arau ichahakbara oparato; arau te'omloka ubhayerae bansadharasakalara majata achila kichumana satkarmasila arau kichumana achila nijara prati spasta atyacarai.
37|114|Arau arasye ami anugraha karaichilo mucha arau haraunara prati
37|115|Arau te'omloka ubhayake lagate te'omlokara sampradayako ud'dhara karaichilo mahasankatara paraa.
37|116|Arau ami sahaya karaichilo te'omlokaka, phalata te'omloke bijayi haichila.
37|117|Arau ami ubhayake bisada kitaba pradana karaichilo.
37|118|Arau ubhayake ami paraicalita karaichilo sarala pathata.
37|119|Arau ami te'omloka ubhayarae babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho.
37|120|Mucha arau haraunara oparata barsita ha'omka chalama (santi arau niraapatta).
37|121|E'idarae'i ami satkarmasilasakalaka puraskrta karao.
37|122|Niscaya te'omloka ubhaye achila amara mumina bandasakalara antarbhukta.
37|123|Arau iliyacho achila raachulasakalara antarbhukta.
37|124|Yetiya te'om nija sampradayaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane’
37|125|‘tomaloke ba'alaka ahbana karaa neki? Athaca paraityaga karaa sarbattoma srastaka
37|126|‘allaha, teraemi tomalokara raba, arau tomalokara purbararti pitr-purausasakalorao raba’.
37|127|Kintu sihamte te'omka asbikara karaichila, seye sihamtaka arasye (sastira babe) upasthita karaa ha’ba.
37|128|Kintu allahara ekanistha bandasakalara katha sbatantra.
37|129|Arau ami te'omra babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho.
37|130|Santi barsita ha'omka iliyachara oparata.
37|131|Niscaya e'idarae'i ami satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao.
37|132|Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama.
37|133|Arau niscaya luto achila raachula sakalara antarbhukta.
37|134|Smarana karaa, yetiya ami te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargara sakaloke ud'dhara karaichilo
37|135|kerala pichata raai yoraa sakalara antarbhukta ejani brd'dhara bahirae.
37|136|Tara pichata arasistasakalaka ami sampurnaraupe dhbansa karaichilo.
37|137|Arau niscaya tomaloke sihamtara dhbansa praapta ancaledi atikrama karaa puraara bhagata
37|138|arau raatito. Tathapi'o tomaloke buji noporaane
37|139|arau niscaya i'unucho achila raachulasakalara antarbhukta.
37|140|Smarana karaa, yetiya te'om boja'i nauyanara pine pala'i ga’la
37|141|Tara pichata te'om lataraita yogadana karaile arau tata te'om paraabhuta sakalara antarbhukta ha’la.
37|142|Tara pichata eta danara mache te'omka gili pelale, arau te'om nijake dhikkara di achila.
37|143|Arau te'om yadi allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosanakarai sakalara antarbhukta naha’lehemtena
37|144|tente te'om punaraut'thanara dina laike machara petate'i thakilehemtena.
37|145|Arasesata te'omka ami niksepa karailo eta trnahina tha'ita, arau te'om achila asustha.
37|146|Arau ami tara oparata iyakatina prajatira eta gacha gaja'i tulilo
37|147|arau te'omka ami eka lakha ba tatokai bechi lokara ocarata praerana karailo.
37|148|Eteke te'omloke imana anichila, phalata ami te'omlokaka kichu kalara babe jiranopabhoga karaibalai dilo.
37|149|Eteke sihamtaka sodhacona, ‘(e'ito kenekuraa katha) tomara pratipalakara babe kan'ya santana arau sihamtara babe putra santana’
37|150|athaba ami phiraistasakalaka narairaupe srsti karaichilo neki ye, seya sihamte dekhichila
37|151|jani thoraa, niscaya sihamte manesaja katha kaya ye
37|152|‘allahe santana janma diche’. Niscaya sihamta michaliya.
37|153|Te'om putra santanara paraibarte kan'ya santana pachanda karaiche neki
37|154|ki haiche tomalokara? Tomaloke kenekuraa bicara karaa
37|155|tente tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraibane
37|156|ne tomalokara kono suspasta dalila-pramana ache
37|157|yadi tomaloke satyabadi tente tomalokara kitaba lai aha.
37|158|Sihamte allaha arau jina jatira majata atmiyatara samparka sthira karaiche, athaca jinabilake jane ye, niscaya sihamtaka upasthita karaa ha’ba (sastira babe).
37|159|Sihamte yi araopa karae tara paraa allaha paraitra arau mahana
37|160|kerala allahara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae.
37|161|Niscaya tomaloke arau tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'iborae
37|162|(ekanistha bandasakalara) kako tomaloke allaha samparke bibhraanta karaiba noraaraiba
37|163|kerala prajjbalita ju'ita yijana dagdha ha’ba tara bahirae.
37|164|Arau (jibraile ka’le) ‘amara pratyekarae babe ache nirdharaita sthana
37|165|‘arau niscaya ami saraibad'dhabharae dandayamana
37|166|‘arau niscaya ami te'omra paraitrata arau mahima ghosanakarai’.
37|167|Arau sihamte (makkabasibilake) arasye kaichila
37|168|‘purbarartisakalara darae yadi amarao ekhana upadesamulaka kitaba thakilehemtena
37|169|‘tente arasye ami allahara ekanistha banda ha’lohemtena’.
37|170|Kintu sihamte seya (kora'anaka) asbikara karaile, eteke anatipalame sihamte janibalai paba.
37|171|Niscaya amara praeraita bandasakalara bisaye amara e'i katha purbe'i nirdharaita haiche ye
37|172|niscaya te'omloka sahayyapraapta ha’ba.
37|173|Arau niscaya amara sain'yabahiniye'i bijayi ha’ba.
37|174|Eteke kichu samayara babe tumi sihamtara paraa mukha ghuraa'i thaka.
37|175|Arau tumi sihamtaka paryabeksana karaa, atisighrae sihamte dekhibalai paba (iyara parainama).
37|176|Sihamte amara sasti tbaraanbita karaiba bicarae neki
37|177|eteke yetiya sihamtara cotalata sasti nami ahiba tetiya satarkakrta bilakara prabhata kimana ye nikrsta ha’ba
37|178|arau kichu samayara babe tumi sihamtara paraa mukha ghuraa'i thaka.
37|179|Tumi sihamtaka paryabeksana karaa, atisighrae sihamte dekhibalai paba (iyara parainama).
37|180|Sihamte yi araopa karae, tara paraa tomara raba paraitra arau mahana, sakalo ksamatara adhikarai.
37|181|Arau santi barsita ha'omka raachulasakalara prati.
37|182|Arau sakalo dharanara prasansa kerala srstijagatara raba allaharae'i praapya.
38|1|Coraada, sapata upadesapurna kora'anara
38|2|baram kaphirasakala aud'dhatya arau biraodhitata nipatita hai ache.
38|3|Ihamtara purbe ami bahuto janagosthika dhbansa karaicho, tetiya sihamte (sahaya bicarai) cinamraichila. Kintu tetiya paraitraanara kono samaya nachila.
38|4|Arau sihamte bismaya bodha karaiche ye, sihamtara ocarata sihamtara majara paraa'i ejana satarkakarai ahiche arau kaphirasakale kaya, ‘e'om ejana yadukara, michaliya’.
38|5|‘E'om sakalo ilahaka kerala ejana ilaha bana'i laiche neki? Niscaya e'ito eta atyascarya bisaya!’
38|6|Arau sihamtara netrsthaniya byaktisakale e'i katha kai amtarai yaya ye, ‘tomaloke'o guci yoraa arau nija nija upasyabilakara pujata abicala thaka. Niscaya e'i bisayato uddesyamulaka’.
38|7|Ami ana kono dharmadarsata enekuraa katha ketiya'o suna na'i, e'ito manesaja uktira bahirae ana eko nahaya.

38|8|‘Amara majara paraa kerala te'omra oparatahe yikara (kora'ana) aratirna karaa ha’la’? Prakrtate sihamte amara kora'ana samparke sandehata patita haiche. Baram sihamte etiya'o mora sasti bhoga karaa na'i.
38|9|Athaba sihamtara ocarata tomara pratipalakara bhandara ache neki? Yijana mahaparaakramasali, asima data.

38|10|Athaba akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majara sakalo bastura oparata sihamtara kono kartrtba ache neki? Yadi ache teneha’le sihamte kono upaya aralambana karai (akasalai) araohana karaa ucita
38|11|e'i bahini tata arasye paraajita ha’ba, purbararti dalasamuhara darae.
38|12|Ihamtara purbe'o asbikara karaichila nuhara sampradaye, ada arau lauha saladharai phira'a'une
38|13|arau chamuda, lagate luta sampradaya arau a'ikara adhibasibilake'o. Sihamta achila eko ekota bisala bahini.
38|14|Sihamtara pratyeke'i raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila. Phalata sihamtara oparata amara sasti sabyasta haichila.
38|15|Arau ihamta kerala apeksa karai ache eta bikata sabdara, yara pichata kono biraama nathakiba.
38|16|Arau sihamte ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Hicapa dirasara purbe'i amara praapya amaka sighrae pradana karaa!’
38|17|Sihamte yi kaya se'i bisaye tumi dhairya dharana karaa arau smarana karaa amara saktisali banda da'udara katha, niscaya te'om achila adhika allaha abhimukhi (ta'obakarai).
38|18|Niscaya ami parbatamalaka anugata karai dichilo, yate e'iborae te'omra lagata puraa-gadhuli mora paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karae
38|19|Arau samabeta caraa'iborako (anugata karai dichilo); pratyeke'i achila adhika allaha abhimukhi.
38|20|Arau ami te'omra raajyaka sudrrha karaichilo arau te'omka pradana karaichilo hikamata arau mimansakarai bagmita.
38|21|Arau tomara ocarata bibadamana lokasakalara sambada ahi pa'ichene? Yetiya sihamte praacira baga'i ibadatara tha'ita praraesa karaichila.
